briefTitle: Outcomes of a Deep Inferior Epigastric Perforator Flap Program
officialTitle: Outcomes of a Deep Inferior Epigastric Perforator Flap Program
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Intraductal carcinoma
* Lobular carcinoma
* Infiltrating ductal carcinoma
* Paget's disease
* BRCA positive

Exclusion Criteria:

* Inflammatory carcinoma of the breast
